description: These gorgeous little bruschettas have a herbaceous flavour. Adding lemon juice and zest brings out the tastes of summer.
name: Zucchini & Saffron Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat griddle or grill. Slice the baguette thinly on an angle, drizzle with olive oil, and grill until crisp on both sides.
Use 1 garlic clove to rub gently over the crisp bread.
Dice the zucchinis and chop the other garlic clove finely. Heat a little oil in a pan and sauteé zucchini and garlic for 5 minutes.

Add a pinch of saffron and cook until vegetables start to turn golden. Add 1 tbsp lemon juice or more to taste, the season and use to top crisp bruschetta. Garnish with lemon zest and basil or mint leaves scattered over.
